page.title: 14ROSELAND GDNS.EST., REDRUTH
page.content: In conclusion it might be generalised that the average home owner living in Roseland Gdns. estate, Redruth, lives in a 15 year old house/bungalow, with 3 bedrooms. He has lived there for more than 10 years and he has made improvements by insulating the attic and adding a conservatory. He did not occupy his home from new, but moved from somewhere in Redruth to gain a 'better house'. His previous home was older, larger, but less convenient. He feels that the main advantage of life on a modern housing estate is limited through traffic, while he considers the main disadvantage to be a lack of privacy.
